snippet: A spokesman for the prime minister of Iraq challenges an Op-Ed article criticizing the government.
abstract: Letter from Ali al-Mussawi, media adviser to Iraq's Prime Minister Nuri Kamal al-Maliki, responds to December 28, 2011, Op-Ed article by Ayad Allawi, Osama al-Nujaifi and Rafe al-Essawi criticizing the Iraq government.
lead_paragraph: A spokesman for the prime minister of Iraq challenges an Op-Ed article criticizing the government.

headline.seo: Iraq’s Government Responds to Its Iraqi Critics
